  • Method Details

    • expectedArrayToString

      public String expectedArrayToString(char[][] compareBoard, int rows, int cols)
      Helper method for creating and initializing a 2D array to be used in creating expected board states
      Parameters:
      compareBoard - 2D character array representing the expected state of the boar
      rows - int representing the number of rows in the board
      cols - int representing the number of columns in the board
      Returns:
      the string of the whole board with board spaces delineated horizontally with a '|' character, the values stored as ' ' OR chars representing player tokens, and the column index at the top
